Title: Directs the state board of elections to prescribe methods for which public contributions may be used in campaigning
Summary: Directs the state board of elections to prescribe methods for which public contributions may be used in campaigning; prohibits the use of such public contributions for negative campaigning.
LawCode: Amd ยง14-100, add ยง14-131, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to directing the state board of elections to prescribe methods for which public contributions may be used in campaigning
